mapper.sql: version_id AS versionId, version, type, title, comment, scene_identify AS sceneIdentify, scene_id AS sceneId, cre_time AS creTime, cre_user_id AS creUserId, rule_div AS ruleDiv, rule_drl AS ruleDrl, status
mapper.select: select from rule_scene_version s inner join (select max(version) versions from rule_scene_version where scene_identify=#{sceneIdentify} and status='1' and type=#{type}) a on s.version=a.versions where s.scene_identify=#{sceneIdentify} and s.status='1' and s.type=#{type}
select from rule_scene_version s where version=#{version} and scene_identify=#{sceneIdentify} and type=#{type}

select from rule_scene_version s where scene_identify=#{sceneIdentify} and status = '1'
and type = 1
and official_version = #{version}
order by official_version+0 desc
and type = 0
and version = #{version}
order by version+0 desc
limit 0,1
